title: WATCH Phillauri's What's Up: Anushka's shaadi song is dhol, dancing and more : Bollywood, News - India Today
text:
Bollywood WATCH Phillauri's What's Up: Anushka's shaadi song is dhol, dancing and more The new song from Anushka Sharma and Diljit Dosanjh-starrer Phillauri, What's Up, is the wedding song of the year. IndiaToday.in | Written by Samrudhi Ghosh A + A - Anushka Sharma (L) and Diljit Dosanjh in stills from the song What's Up 
The wedding season may be over, but Phillauri's new song What's Up takes you back to all the revelry and fun. Much like the film's trailer, the song oscillates between Suraj Sharma's wedding with Mehreen Pirzada in the present and a flashback of Anushka Sharma getting ready to tie the knot with her lover Diljit Dosanjh. 
Sung by Mika Singh and Jasleen Royal, What's Up is an upbeat Punjabi shaadi song that is sure to get you grooving. Anushka took to Twitter to share the song with the caption, "Hey WhatsUp? Here's the bride with the 1st wedding song this season #WhatsUp @TSeries @OfficialCSFilms @foxstarhindi." Hey WhatsUp? Here's the bride with the 1st wedding song this season #WhatsUp @TSeries @OfficialCSFilms @foxstarhindi https://t.co/8Wk8Lo2pM5 â€” Anushka Sharma (@AnushkaSharma) February 23, 2017 
Phillauri, which marks the directorial debut of Anshai Lal, is scheduled to release on March 24. 
ALSO WATCH | Anushka Sharma speaks on marriage, women in cinema and friendzoning men To get the latest entertainment news and gossip, follow us on Twitter @Showbiz_IT and Like us on facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
